name: Person Phone
description: Telephone number and type of a person.

fields.name: BusinessEntityID
fields.description: Business entity identification number. Foreign key to Person.BusinessEntityID.

fields.name: PhoneNumberTypeID
fields.description: Kind of phone number. Foreign key to PhoneNumberType.PhoneNumberTypeID.

fields.name: ModifiedDate
fields.description: Date and time the record was last updated. Default: getdate()
